Introduction

Yuem is a South Korean singer-songwriter, composer, rapper, and former member of the girl group H.U.B under New Planet Entertainment, which is now known as Campus Entertainment. She served as the group's lead vocalist, rapper, and composer.

Prior to H.U.B's official debut, Yuem composed, wrote, and arranged the group's pre-release song "Our Time Together," released on November 24, 2016. H.U.B officially debuted on February 9, 2017, with their second digital single "Girl Gang"/"Girl in Black." On April 6, 2018, it was announced that Yuem, along with members Gracie and Keina, left the group.

In 2021, it was revealed that Yuem had gotten married. She has not been active in the music industry since then.
